channel.title: Monorail visual rework in 1.5?
channel.description:
Is the monorail tram going to receive any additional visual reworks in 1.5? I always though that while the model shows a lot of work it never made a lot of sense and its textures feel too handcrafted and complex (too grainy).
![ppt-on-monorail-technology-22-638|638x359](upload://tUFgiFD53fPPfwwmw7jN54vc665.jpeg)
Takig a look to that photo reference the textures could be a lot simplier and make better use of phong materials (flooring doesn't have any crevices and the same goes to walls), seats are simplier an usually aren't individually separated (less polygons).

item.title: Monorail visual rework in 1.5?
item.dc:creator: Nacery
item.description:
Is the monorail tram going to receive any additional visual reworks in 1.5? I always though that while the model shows a lot of work it never made a lot of sense and its textures feel too handcrafted and complex (too grainy).

Takig a look to that photo reference the textures could be a lot simplier and make better use of phong materials (flooring doesn’t have any crevices and the same goes to walls), seats are simplier an usually aren’t individually separated (less polygons).
